document.full_text: u.s. drugmaker merck & co  is to discontinue a major trial of a key vaccine from intercell  designed to protect against serious hospital infections, the austrian biotech firm said on wednesday.
document.title: merck ends trial of intercell's mrsa vaccine
lines_and_colors: u.s. drugmaker merck & co  is to discontinue a major trial of a key vaccine from intercell  designed to protect against serious hospital infections, the austrian biotech firm said on wednesday.
